name: splitmenubuttons
title: Split Menu Buttons
description: Split Menu Buttons combine the sleek aesthetics of menu buttons with the versatility of drop down menus to create a navigational interface that captures the best of both worlds. It renders attractive CSS based oval buttons with an optional "toggle" element dynamically added next to it that reveals a drop down menu when interacted with. The drop down menu is simply a regular UL list you define on the page, and can be multi levelled.
